colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024B ('DI LA RLUNG DANG KLUNG ZHES PA GNYIS YOD PA DON 'DRA BA'AM, ,GANG LTAR YANG SNGA MA'I YI GE LTAR BYAS TE, MCHOG GSUM SPYI MA MCHOD PA'I SGO NAS RLUNG RTA DAR BAR BYED PA'I CHO GA 'DI NI CHEN PO HOR YUL GYI GRVA RIGS BLO BZANG LUNG RTOGS DANG RNAM RGYAL GNYIS KYIS RLUNG RTA'I BSKANG BSHAGS CIG GYIS ZHES DNGOS PO'I SKYES DANG BCAS YANG NAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR,  ^ BTZUN GZUGS NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS RANG LO NYER BRGYAD LA BABS PA'I NAG ZLA'I TSES BZANG POR, CHOS SDE CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU RANG GZHAN NAS GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA'I @025A *, ,YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG BSAM SGRUB MING CAN GYIS BGYIS PA,, ,,) STAG SENG KHYUNG 'BRUG BZHI DANG GROGS PA YI, ,RLUNG RTA YANG LA BSKYED PA'I RTEN 'BREL LA, ,BRTEN NAS 'GRO 'DUG SMRA SPYOD DPAL DAR ZHING, ,BDE BSKYID PHUN TSOGS GONG DU RGYAS GYUR CIG , ,,(DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
